Container.Name: jfa-go
Container.Overview:
jfa-go is a user management app for Jellyfin (and now Emby) that provides invite-based account creation as well as other features that make one's instance much easier to manage.
\* I am not the creator or maintainer of this container I am merely providing the Unraid template.
Container.Description:
jfa-go is a user management app for Jellyfin (and now Emby) that provides invite-based account creation as well as other features that make one's instance much easier to manage.
\* I am not the creator or maintainer of this container I am merely providing the Unraid template.

Config.Name: WebUI
Config.Description: Port to use to access jfa-go webui.

Config.Name: Config
Config.Description: Path to wherever you want to store the config file and other data.

Config.Name: Jellfyfin Config Directory
Config.Description: Path to Jellyfin config directory, ignore if using Emby.
